bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Logging and checkpoint saving stopped working for me when I run experiments via slurm system. I am using log keys in return functions: training_epoch_end/validation_epoch_end. Version 0.7.6 works. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behaviour:
Define Tensorboard logger Run training using slurm system sbatch ... No logs.
<denchmark-h:h4>Code sample</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behaviour</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
PyTorch 1.4.0: PyTorch-lightning 0.8.1, Linux, Python 3.7.6, CUDA/cuDNN 10.1, 7.6.5,

comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!

Hi, I think I'm having the same problem, running locally logs work correctly (I'm sending to comet), but when I run on a cluster through slurm using sbatch or srun, the experiments in comet are created, but none of the logging works. Edit: Downgraded to 0.7.6 and it works.

I think this might be due to an issue due to how the rank id is set, I'm not totally sure, but it could have occurred here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/pull/2231>#2231</denchmark-link>
I guess it's due to a malfunction with , sucht that the gated code is never executed. See also comment in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/issues/2278#issuecomment-646997797>#2278 (comment)</denchmark-link>

If you want a quick fix, just remove this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pytorch_lightning/utilities/distributed.py#L11>line</denchmark-link> . (Dirty solution)

Fixed by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/pull/2339>#2339</denchmark-link>
Please run from master or 0.8.2 on June 25
